Of the calm moonbeams, a soft influence mild ;

The crag-built desarts of the barren deep

anchor.line: Was panted forth in anguish whilst thy pain

line.milestone: Made my heart mad, & thou who did inhale

anchor.line: Became mad too, & built a Temple there
And spoke and were oracular, & lured
The erring nations round to mutual war

line.milestone: And faithless faith, such as Jove kept with

anchor.line: Which now floats upward as among tall weeds
With a serener light & crimson air
Intense yet soft the rocks & woods around
